duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop project plans and strategies to ensure successful project completion within set constraints.
Monitor and adjust project scope, objectives, and progress as needed.
Facilitate daily/weekly project meetings and communicate with team leadership about project scope and delivery requirements.
Identify and manage risks and dependencies, and resolve issues to realign the project with success criteria.
Provide regular project updates to stakeholders and track project costs to meet budget.
Champion the project process and drive adherence within the project team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Project Management, Business, Management Information Systems, Communication, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (Agile, SAFe, or Project Management Professional (PMP) certification preferred)
